gloss: a body of people who settle far from home but maintain ties with their homeland; inhabitants remain nationals of their home state but are not literally under the home state's system of government
people who are confined to their homes
a body of people who settle far from home but maintain ties with their homeland; inhabitants remain nationals of their home state but are not literally under the home state's system of government
the people who inhabit a territory or state
a society in an advanced state of social development (e.g., with complex legal and political and religious organizations)
